casebody.data:
Keith M. CURRAN et al.
v.
COURT OF PROBATE NORTHEAST DISTRICT et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 8, 2016.

Mathew Olkin, in support of the petition.

The petition by the plaintiff Haiying Tao for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 163 Conn.App. 904, 133 A.3d 526 (2016), is denied.
